text: Berezovka () is a rural locality (a selo) in Alginsky Selsoviet, Davlekanovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 145 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 25 km from Davlekanovo, 4 km from Alga. == References == Category:Rural localities in Davlekanovsky District
title: Berezovka, Davlekanovsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
